title: La Huerta
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: Vegetarian restaurant in the Bello District in the Medellin metropolitan area, approx. 10-minute walk from the Niquia metro station. Aattractive decor and plenty of seating. Meal of the day served until closing, and an a la carte menu. Also serves snacks, juices, housemade beer and wine. Sells a few grocery items include whole grain bread, cereals, dried fruit, vegetable oil, and vinegar.
